Genes.GeneDefExtended.label: Fall hibernation
Genes.GeneDefExtended.description: The creature will begin to gradually fall into hibernation with the onset of autumn. During this time, the pawn will be completely incapacitated.

Genes.GeneDefExtended.label: Winter hibernation
Genes.GeneDefExtended.description: The creature will begin to gradually fall into hibernation with the onset of winter. During this time, the pawn will be completely incapacitated. Hibernation can continue indefinitely on a map with eternal winter.
